skill_constraints: Single points of failure in DevOps and Backend. Frontend over-allocation in Sprint 1.
resource_bottlenecks: DevOps Lead for infrastructure tasks; Senior Backend developer for all API work.
mitigation_strategies: Rely on individual expertise; accept key person dependency risk.

skill_constraints: Onboarding and integration overhead for new Mid-level Backend Developer.
resource_bottlenecks: Increased communication and code review overhead for Backend Lead.
mitigation_strategies: Add a Mid-level Backend Developer to parallelize API and data persistence tasks (Sprints 3-8).

skill_constraints: Capacity reduced by 10% for dedicated cross-training activities.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior developer time is split between implementation and mentoring.
mitigation_strategies: Implement formal cross-training (Backend <-> DevOps) and pair programming (Senior FE <-> Mid FE).
